name: ABC
text: A police officer rescued several ducklings that fell through a storm grate in Wisconsin, standing in the sewer to pull out the fallen ducks one by one before reuniting them with their mom. https://t.co/SuJCZx4uQO https://t.co/plWjsIPFpx

name: ABC
text:
The vast majority of Confederate memorials weren’t erected in the years directly following the Civil War. They were installed as symbols of white supremacy during periods when Black Americans’ civil rights were under attack.

More, via @FiveThirtyEight: https://t.co/ztaEtbgDtO

name: ABC
text:

— Texas reports record COVID-19 fatalities, hospitalizations.
— Florida has 41 hospitals with no available beds.
— Site cancels Texas GOP's in-person state convention.
— Ivy League cancels all fall sports.

name: ABC
text: RT @ABCWorldNews: ONE-ON-ONE: @PierreTABC interviewed Attorney General William Barr, pressing him on mail-in voting due to the COVID-19 threat, the violent clearing of Lafayette Park and Black Lives Matter – with Barr now acknowledging racial profiling by police. https://t.co/ETKxk6bEnK https://t.co/D5IDYFtQnc

name: ABC
text: A new study finds that a long-acting injectable medication given as a shot every eight weeks is significantly more effective than a HIV prevention pill taken every day. https://t.co/uT2kd7J9tH

name: ABC
text:
In 2020, the share of female candidates who are Republican has grown substantially, up from about a quarter in 2018 to 39% now.

name: ABC
text: EXCLUSIVE: In an interview with @PierreTABC, Attorney General William Barr offered a forceful defense of the Justice Department's independence amid criticism that its work has been leveraged as a political tool for President Trump. https://t.co/JvkNX4J9oh

name: ABC
text: Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms says she will sign an executive order mandating masks in Georgia's largest city, defying Gov. Brian Kemp's decision to strongly encourage but not require face coverings. https://t.co/0BYiNGccyK

text: Scrabble to ban slurs, other offensive words from official tournaments. https://t.co/C4aKmfYq6W

name: ABC
text: The U.K., Sweden and Brazil have each allowed herd immunity to inform their approaches to COVID-19 in one way or another—with severe consequences. https://t.co/qLAGPQHgCc

name: ABC
text: After a years-long battle, the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has rolled back a series of proposed limitations to payday loans in a move advocacy groups call a "grave error" that could potentially trap vulnerable people in debt. https://t.co/zLENxBNVwo

name: ABC
text: Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman, a key witness in Pres. Trump's impeachment inquiry, is retiring from the U.S. Army, citing a "campaign of bullying" and "retaliation" directed by Trump. https://t.co/Iw4wJapsfz
